actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the increase of the Federal share of certain projects under title 23, United States Code.

summary.text: Provides that the Federal share of projects on the Federal-aid secondary system during the period February 12, 1975 to June 30, 1975 shall be 100 percent.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the increase of the Federal share of certain projects under title 23, United States Code.
